backend/main.mo: Defines equipment, spare parts, cataloguing, maintenance, documents, and user profile types with storage maps and authorization, plus comparison functions and utilities for disciplines.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog component built on AlertDialog with customizable actions.
Dropdown component with type-to-filter search for selecting equipment by number, tag, or name.
Wrapper component for labeled form fields with required markers, help text, and error display.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Provides shared layout with header, footer, and main content container.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating equipment and related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/cataloguingTemplates.ts: Defines discipline-specific cataloguing field templates and a helper to retrieve template fields.
frontend/src/lib/csvImport.ts: Provides CSV parsing, validation helpers for equipment and spare parts rows, and utilities to parse dates and BigInts.
frontend/src/lib/dates.ts: Converts bigint timestamps to formatted dates and vice versa.
frontend/src/lib/disciplines.ts: Maps engineering discipline enums to labels and back, plus predefined discipline options.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and detects authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/lib/exports.ts: Provides CSV and basic PDF export utilities plus CSV template download generation.
frontend/src/lib/files.ts: Converts browser File objects to ExternalBlob with optional progress and formats file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/importMappings.ts: Defines CSV headers and maps equipment and spare part CSV rows into structured backend-ready objects.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Simple validators for required fields, numeric input, and email formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CataloguingPage.tsx: UI for creating, editing, and deleting cataloguing records tied to equipment with form handling and queries.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Manages equipment documents including upload with progress, metadata editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentListPage.tsx: Displays, filters, edits, and deletes equipment records with search and discipline filtering.
frontend/src/pages/EquipmentMasterPage.t: Form page for creating equipment records, handling validation, authentication, and submission via createEquipment API.
frontend/src/pages/ImportPage.tsx: CSV import interface for equipment and spare parts with preview, validation, mutation calls, and result reporting.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: CRUD interface for maintenance records tied to selected equipment, including creation, editing, deletion, and listing.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Reporting page that fetches equipment, spare parts, and maintenance data and exports them to CSV or PDF.
frontend/src/pages/SparePartsPage.tsx: Management page for spare parts with creation, editing, deletion, file attachments, equipment linking, and search.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current features, pending feature requests, and versioning for an equipment management app.
